ERR_CLAIM_HASH: claim.hash must be lowercase 64-char sha256 hex and claim.algo must be sha256.
ERR_CLAIM_CREATED_AT: claim.createdAt must be a valid ISO date-time.
ERR_EXTERNAL_WITNESS: Add at least one witnesses[] entry with kind and an http(s) URL.
ERR_ARTIFACT_URL: artifacts URLs must be valid http(s) links when present.
ERR_ARTIFACT_POST_URL_REQUIRED: In strict mode, artifacts.postUrl is required.
ERR_VERIFICATION_METADATA: If verification.status=verified, include verification.verifiedAt and verification.verifier.
